QuestData.Title: A Perfect Match
QuestData.Description: Elder Lusshan and I agree that the best path forward will be to work together.$B$BWe will share with the Pearlfin our superior military knowledge and weaponry.$B$BIn return, they will be a powerful ally should we again encounter the Horde.$B$BTake this crate of equipment and weapons. I need you to go around the village and equip the jinyu with weapons befitting their skills.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Pearlfin Aqualytes and arm them with the proper equipment.
QuestData.CompletionText: The jinyu are skilled in different ways. It is up to us to find their strengths.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. Let those Horde mongrels show their faces now!
